data.title: Harold Wilson, Ii Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Harold B. Wilson, II AKA "Swifty" a life long Sullivan County resident, died Sunday April 16, 2023 at Garnet Health Medical Center, Harris, NY.  He was 42.       The son of Caro...
data.text:
Harold B. Wilson, II AKA "Swifty" a life long Sullivan County resident, died Sunday April 16, 2023 at Garnet Health Medical Center, Harris, NY. He was 42.

The son of Carol Mixon and Terry Wilson, he was born February 25, 1981 in Harris, NY.

Swifty worked in construction, he was a logger and also enjoyed working on cars. He was a carefree loving son, brother, father and friend to many. He was always ready to lend a helping hand.

Survivors include his loving parents Carol Mixon and Terry Wilson; his brother, Billy Wilson; his sisters, Sheila Wilson and Tara Wilson; his loving children, Harold, Marissa, Kayla, Patrick, Izabelle, and Hope; his grandchildren, Harold, Rip and Andrew; many cousins including Jim Roemer, aunts including his favorite aunt, Lori Englese, uncles, nieces, nephews, friends and colleagues, and his best friend, Gil Trujillo.

Visitation will be Friday (today) April 21, 2023 from 2 to 4 PM in the Harris Funeral Home, West St. at Buckley, Liberty, NY.

Funeral arrangements have been entrusted to the Harris Funeral Home, West St. at Buckley, Liberty, NY 845-292-0001 or 845-439-5200 or www.Harris-FH.com
